item.title: Research About 42ecole
item.description: wanted to know what can I learn if attend the school. Even though I’m not that much prepared with French. They mainly focus on teaching code with C. C is the mostly interesting language for me, by its usage in various machine. Interesting There is a person who got an internship in Teslar just after 8 months schooling of 42. ‘He is a pushy man’ There is an argument which is 42ecole system doesn’t have any valide result, on LinkedIn

item.title: Think and grow rich transcribing cures me
item.description: How to be rich even in spirituality. He does really great job and, no matter what it is, his book just shows me how to be the rich man in genuine term. Just having a lot of money in material isn’t a meaning of right form of Rich. The Rich that I think is, Materially, and spiritually being free. Of course, Being free almost can be achieved by materially Free, by a lot earning of money.
